article.title: Alion Awarded $4.3M WSTIAC Task Order to Explore New Technologies
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Alion Science and Technology has been awarded a $4.3 million task order to identify and explore new and emerging technologies on behalf of the Joint and Special Operations Program at the Naval Surface Warfare Center, Navy Crane in Crane, Indiana. Under the contract, Alion will perform system modeling and simulations, component design review and improvements.
